Desire

March 2011

The completely wrong way; It is the most life and energy consuming thing on Earth.

It has many destinations. Fame, knowledge, beauty, sex, money, freedom.

Those who desire will never get it. Or they will get it with a collateral damage making not worth it.

Remember there is no Me who can have desires. There is Desire who can have — unfortunately — many Mes, us, just those usual guys trapped in this (fucking) simulacra.

This story is about desire. With focus on values, simulacra.
Newsledge
Anonymous
